website_summaries.verdict: The best baitcaster on the market, with super-smooth action and mile-long cast, delivering great performance for its small size.
pros: With practice, will cast accurately and far with little to no backlash
Allows for switch to varying sizes and weights of bait with little adjustment needed
cons: Handle is a bit small, and side of reel plate can rub against caster’s hand
Reel is a bit small for some users

customer_reviews.title: Lews Tournament MB Speed Spool is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to dial in and like others have said, it can cast a mile! Very glad it came with the dual braking system because you will need it when adjusting to your style of cast! I no longer have to use a baseball batter's swing to get my lure where I want it to go, just a nice gentle toss will do the trick. No unusual noises and the fast retrieval ratio, I got the 7.5 to 1, brings them in fast!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory B. Ray

customer_reviews.title: I really love the reel but I've had a terrible time getting ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love the reel but I've had a terrible time getting it tuned in. I've had many baitcaster reels but the last time I purchased one was about 16 years ago. I'm sure the advancements in technology are causing me a learning curve but I've had to turn on all 4 centrifugal breaks just to keep from birds-nesting at the beginning of the cast. Not totally blaming the reel but from the videos I watched, that made tuning the reel appear effortless, I'm just a little disappointed I'm how difficult it has been.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great Reel
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to dial in this reel, have absolutely no back lashes with this reel no matter what I do. The reel is super smooth, I paired mine with 30 lb braid and am using it as my top water reel, it casts 30-40 yards easy. I bought this reel to use in place of my Abu Garcis Gen 3 SX reel, that reel is OK but it back lashes more often that I would like. At under $100.00 this reel is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: MarkF88

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight but Stable Reel
customer_reviews.text: The reel fits my hand perfectly and balances very well with the rod that I am using. It is smooth and because of the metal body very stable when reeling in bass and/or walleye which are my fishing choices. I am using Kastking 25lb braid with a 12lb fluorocarbon leader. The high speed retrieve allows me to maintain tension on the line while landing a fish and maintain a hook set when fishing slow baits (rubber worms and creature baits.) Because of its light weight, I can cast repeatedly without become tired or getting a sore arm.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Haddock

customer_reviews.title: Lotta reel in a small package
customer_reviews.text: A nice reel, a little noisy around the spool area, but a good caster so far. I gotta have 500+ casts on it, 2 lube jobs, and 30# braid. Still casts great w/ 1/4 oz jig heads in kietech swim baits. I have the mags turned completely off ( a little worry-some to me ) as I have become so proficient w/ this reel, there not needed...! I’ll re-visit this review in the spring of 2019 for an update...
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth and backlash proof
customer_reviews.text: If you're thinking about buying a reel u can not go wrong with this lew's reel better than the 289.99 duckett real that I purchased. I stand by lews 100 percent and always will. Buy far best reel even if your a millionaire buy this reel u will not be anything but blown away
customer_reviews.author: C- Shu

customer_reviews.title: All metal but light not the cheap reel
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth! Cast a mile fits hand great. Mine is paired with a falcon lowrider xg with 15lb power pro. Casts a mile very easy to setup full Metal body not like those cheap lews you can buy at local stores performs better than my curado imo but half the price. I want another one just have no reason or excuse to pull the trigger yet lol.
customer_reviews.author: 300zxTravis

customer_reviews.title: Great reel for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I am somewhat of a Lew’s Fanatic when it comes to their reels. I have read a lot of reviews trying to make my dollar go farther and this reel is available in a couple different retrieves as well as left and right handed. This is my fourth and specificity as a crank setup. Really looking forward to trying it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny C.

customer_reviews.title: Lew's MB Baitcasting Reel is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a Lew's MB reel last month and I am very satisfied with it. Easy to make long casts, without backlashes after dialing it in. Nice low profile and light weight reel. Two fishing trips with MB and plenty of cranking power for reeling in big bass and the drag works great. Just ordered another Lew's MB 7.5 from Amazon and can't wait to get back on the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C Draker

customer_reviews.title: One of the best at this price point.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing reel. Very smooth. Easy to control, casts light lures without problem. Perfect gear ratio for crankbaits. First Lews reel and I was so impressed I've bought 3 more. On par with the Lews Tournament Lite which is twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Drew S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: This reel represents a great value. Quality feel, light, easy, precise adjustments. I have used it mostly for crankbaits and been very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Buy a couple for $100!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this reel! My first Lew's. In fact, I just ordered a Tournament Pro s well. I'm done with Shimano. Not knocking them, but this kicks the crap out my Curado 70 in casting distance, even with 1/4 oz square bills.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho knife crazy

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional reel
customer_reviews.text: Excellent !!!! I have 7 on various rods, for different applications. My reels have been worked hard without a single problem or complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon W. Director

customer_reviews.title: Best reel for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have fished with most top of the line reels. This Lews competes with all of them. Easy casting, great brakes, and plenty of drag. Abbott half the price of most others in its class. I will be buying many more.
customer_reviews.author: Andrewl07

customer_reviews.title: still learning how to use it best.. mostly what line works with it
customer_reviews.text: works well. still learning how to use it best.. mostly what line works with it.. but over all its a good reel
customer_reviews.author: Jerry O Neil

customer_reviews.title: Took it out the other day for test works great can cast a mile with no backlash
customer_reviews.text: Took it out the other day for test works great can cast a mile with no backlash.great reel!

customer_reviews.title: Love this reel
customer_reviews.text: Holy Cow! Love this reel. Went all day without a bird nest, all day, with this reel. No matter what I tied on, no matter how light, this reel casted smoothly and accurately, without a single backlash. I just recently ordered another one as a replacement for a reel that is not as snag free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great reel!
customer_reviews.text: This reel cast a mile! Smooth anti birdnest controls..... Works better then any bait caster I own even twice the price. Comfortable smooth drag and controls right out of the box. Very happy.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I love this reel. Very smooth casting and no backlash!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Reel
customer_reviews.text: Great reel for the money, Shimano Curado Performance for less. Haven’t had a single issue with the reel, and it’s been dunked in saltwater by accident more than once. Owned it for 6 months since this review was written and still feels new.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended, throws great and backlash’s only if you are not paying attention I love it , one of the best on the market

customer_reviews.title: Best reel for the money
customer_reviews.text: One of the best reels I've owned, casts smooth, light weight yet strong enough to handle even gar

customer_reviews.title: This is my second lews reel and they're awesome. This is the best casting reel I've ever ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second lews reel and they're awesome. This is the best casting reel I've ever owned. This reel blew the revo reel I lost out of the water. I'm for sure a lews reel guy going forward.

customer_reviews.title: Love the MB reels
customer_reviews.text: Great bass reel, extremely smooth casting and the mag brake system works really well. This is my 3rd MB reel. If you are looking for a solid mid priced reel for large and small, this series is one to consider.

customer_reviews.title: A small extremely smooth operation with good adjustments for backlash avoidance
customer_reviews.text: A small extremely smooth operation with good adjustments for backlash avoidance. Made 35 yd casts with 3/8th oz lure without problems - using suffix 20 lb test (8 lb equivilant). Yes I would buy another one.

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for the price

customer_reviews.title: Best reel out there for the money

customer_reviews.title: Good solid reels.
customer_reviews.text: These are good, solid reels for the money that perform above their price point.

customer_reviews.title: Performance baitcaster
customer_reviews.text: This reel allow you to adjust for limit or no back lash. Letting you cast much farther then some of the others i have. Very smooth and quite operation. This is my fourth lews reel

customer_reviews.title: Great reel!
customer_reviews.text: This my second Lew's reel, and I continue to be impressed with the products. The 6.8:1 ratio is perfect for bladed baits. The LFS series is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Tom F.

customer_reviews.title: i fish 20 plus tournaments a year and these Lew's reels are the best!
customer_reviews.text: very high quality reel. i fish 20 plus tournaments a year and these Lew's reels are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Joe b

customer_reviews.title: Great performance and really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have Lews MB reels on all of my baitcasting rods. This one was a bargain with no shipping and no taxes. I havent caught a monster with it but I have boated a number of 4 and 5 pound largemouth. Great performance and really comfortable. No more sore hands and I feel like I can get a good hook set with the small profile of the reel. Casting is also a dream. Whether youre crankbaiting or flipping its a solid performer. Just get the right speed for your application. The 6 to one is a good all around reel.
customer_reviews.author: Kenms

customer_reviews.title: Best reel I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This reel is so smooth and well built. I got it in the 7.5:1 ratio so I can use it for jigging, and I cannot wait until this coming spring!

customer_reviews.title: Best Price on the internet!!
customer_reviews.text: Lews products are some of the best on the market! For the $$$....they are the best on the market!!

customer_reviews.title: One star

This is my 5th reel of this kind in two years, it is a very good reel but this reel was in a opened box, not wrapped in plastic like all the others were and was scratched and fingerprints all over it and the handle was used, this looked like a used reel. BEWARE! This reel ordered 6/10/2018

Let's just say I didn't have the most success with the one from Walmart but decided to purchase this reel anyway. I took the old reel off the pole and put on this lees reel and after just one day I was casting much farther and barely getting any birds nest. I would recommend this to anyone questioning if baitcasters are the right ones for them.

Setting the spool brake by raising rod tip with bait attached adjust brake until bait starts to drop then adjust brake tighter provides excellent casting results. Have owned all baitcaster brands far and away the best handling.

product_meta.title: Lews Fishing Tournament MB Baitcast Reel
product_meta.description:
The Lew's Tournament MB Baitcast Reel upholds the long lasting tradition Lew's reels have provide anglers for years. This reel weights in at a very impressive weight of just 7.6 oz and is loaded with features and premium components. For smooth operation a 10 ball bearing system is used in conjunction with a zero-reverse one-way clutch bearing!

The reel itself is wrapped around a carbon composite frame that is helps cut weight and provides incredible strength so you get a solid feel in your hand. Other notable features include a multi-setting brake feature, Zirconia line guide, external lube port and more!

Specifications:

 * Weight: 6.7 oz
 * Bearings: 9SS+1RB
 * Line Cap: 12/120

-One-piece die-cast aluminum frame
-Drilled and forged, double anodized aluminum U style spool
-Easily removable palming graphite sideplate
-High-strength solid brass gearing
-Premium 10 double shielded stainless steel bearing system (9+1)
-Zero-reverse one-way stainless steel clutch bearing
-Externally-adjustable Multi-Setting Brake (MSB) dual cast control system
-Double anodized aluminum tension adjustment with audible click
-Rugged carbon composite drag system - 14lb max drag
-Audible click, bowed, anodized aluminum star drag
-Bowed, lightweight, aluminum reel handle with Lew's custom paddle handle knobs
-Zirconia line guide
